text:
Leslie Odom Jr. (, born August 6, 1981) is an American actor and singer. He has performed on Broadway and in television and movie, and has released three solo jazz albums. He is known for the role of Aaron Burr in the Broadway musical "Hamilton".
He won the 2016 Tony Award for Best Actor in a Musical and the Grammy Award for Best Musical Theater Album.
